CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_inspection
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale01}The ship's captain approaches where you're chained to the mast, his boots heavy on the wooden deck. He circles you slowly, examining his newest acquisition with a predatory grin. The salt spray and rocking waves make it difficult to keep your balance as he runs his calloused hands across your body, commenting to his crew about your worth. He announces you'll be working below deck, where the crew can make proper use of you during the long voyage.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_inspection_submit
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale04}The captain seems pleased by your compliance. He unshackles you from the mast and leads you by a rope leash down narrow wooden stairs into the cramped quarters below deck. The smell of sweat, salt, and sex is overwhelming. He throws you onto a worn hammock and begins unlacing his breeches, explaining that obedient slaves are rewarded with the captain's personal attention. As he takes you roughly, the hammock swaying with the ship's motion, you realize this is your new reality on the open sea.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_inspection_resist
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale06}The captain's face darkens at your defiance. He backhands you hard enough to make your ears ring, then signals to two nearby sailors. They grab your arms roughly as the captain snarls that you need to learn your place. He orders them to take you to the cargo hold and let the entire crew know that the new slave needs breaking in. The sailors drag you away as you hear the captain announcing to the deck that there's fresh entertainment available below.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale117}Go limp and let them drag you.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_first_day_hold
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale104}You've been thrown into the ship's dark hold, chained to a beam. The floor is damp, the air thick with the smell of tar and mold. You can hear the creaking of the hull and the distant shouts of sailors above. This is your first night as a slave on this ship. A sailor descends the stairs with a lantern, carrying a bowl of watery gruel. "Eat up, slave," he says, placing it just out of reach of your chains. "You'll need your strength for what's coming."

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale107}Strain against your chains to reach it.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_dragged_deck
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale108}Rough hands grab you and drag you up from the hold. The sudden sunlight blinds you as you're hauled onto the main deck. The crew has gathered, eager to see the new slave. The first mate pushes you to your knees. "Time you started earning your keep," he announces. "Show the boys what you can do with that mouth." The sailors crowd around, already unlacing their breeches. Your heart pounds with fear and shame as you realize what they expect.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_mast_display
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale112}You're stripped naked and chained to the ship's mast as a display of the captain's newest property. The entire crew passes by during their duties, leering at you, making crude comments about your body. Some reach out to grope you. The sun beats down, then gives way to cold wind. You're left there for hours, a warning to any other captives on board. When night falls, a sailor approaches with keys - but his intentions aren't to free you.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_crew_duty
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale08}You're brought up from the hold and positioned near the ship's wheel, where a bench has been set up. The first mate announces it's time for the crew's morale boost, and you realize with dread what he means. One by one, sailors take their turn with you as the others cheer and make crude comments. The ocean stretches endlessly in all directions - there's nowhere to run, nowhere to hide. You are completely at their mercy.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_gangbang
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale11}You're thrown onto a pile of cargo nets in the dark hold. The sailors waste no time, surrounding you and tearing at what little clothing you have. Rough hands grab at every part of your body as they take turns violating you. The ship rocks with the waves, and your world becomes nothing but pain, the taste of salt and cum, and the cruel laughter of men using your body for their pleasure. When they finally finish, you're left bruised and leaking their seed, discarded like cargo.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale120}Fight back until they beat you unconscious.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_hold_chained
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale74}You spend your days chained in the dark hold, surrounded by barrels and crates. The smell of bilge water, tar, and unwashed bodies is overwhelming. Sailors come and go throughout the day, some just to look at you, others to use you. You've learned the ship's rhythms - the changing of the watch means a new set of men might visit. A grizzled sailor approaches, unfastening his belt. "Time for your duties, slave," he grunts.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_serving_duties
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale78}You've been assigned to serve food in the mess hall. Naked except for your chains, you carry bowls of watery stew to the sailors, who grope and fondle you as you pass. Some pull you onto their laps, making you sit on them while they eat. Others make you kneel under the table while they finish their meal. The cook watches with amusement, occasionally calling you over to "taste test" something - which never involves actual food.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale80}Smile and offer yourself to whoever wants you.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_night_watch
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale82}It's the middle of the night and you're curled up in your corner of the hold when a sailor from the night watch descends the stairs with a lantern. He's bored, he says, and decided you could keep him company. He sets down the lantern and starts unlacing his breeches, telling you he's been thinking about you all watch. In the flickering light, you can see his eager expression as he approaches.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale84}Pull him close and whisper that you've been waiting for him.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_stock_room
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale86}You've been moved to a corner of the stock room, chained behind a large chest. It's become your designated spot - whenever a sailor has free time, they know where to find you. The quartermaster has even started scheduling your use, keeping a tally on a slate board. You've lost count of how many men have taken you here. Your body knows nothing but service now, responding automatically to each new visitor.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale87}Accept your role as the ship's communal slave.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_crew_broken
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale89}You don't think anymore. You don't need to. When hands reach for you, your body moves. When cocks are presented, your mouth opens. When legs are pushed apart, you spread them wider. The sailors have commented on how well-trained you've become - no longer fighting, no longer crying, just a warm, willing body for their use. One of them pats your head and calls you a good girl. You feel a distant flicker of something that might have once been shame, but it's drowned in the empty acceptance that has become your existence.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_captains_whore
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale13}You're summoned to the captain's cabin. Unlike the rough treatment from the crew, the captain takes his time with you. He pours wine and makes you drink it, then slowly undresses you while discussing the ship's route and cargo as if you were a person, not property. But when he bends you over his desk and takes you from behind, the illusion of civility vanishes. He uses you thoroughly, possessively, marking you as his personal plaything. When he's done, he chains you to a post in his cabin, explaining you'll sleep here from now on - available whenever he desires.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_captains_first_morning
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale93}You wake in the captain's cabin, the chain around your neck reminding you of your new status. The captain is already dressed, looking at you with a mixture of possession and amusement. "My property now," he says simply. "You'll serve me in all ways. Resist, and I'll give you back to the crew - they're much less gentle than I am." He gestures for you to kneel beside his chair while he eats breakfast, occasionally tossing you scraps like a pet. You realize this is your life now - the captain's personal slave.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_captains_bathing
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale97}The captain has ordered a bath prepared in his cabin - a rare luxury at sea. But it's not for you. You're made to fill the tub with heated water, then strip and kneel beside it as he undresses and climbs in. "Wash me," he commands. You take the cloth and soap, carefully cleaning his body while he relaxes with his eyes closed. His hands wander over your naked form as you work, casually possessive. When he's satisfied, he pulls you into the water with him, using your body for his pleasure in the warm bath.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale99}Take your time, making the experience pleasurable for him.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_captains_dinner
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale100}The captain has guests tonight - the first mate and the ship's quartermaster. You're made to serve them dinner naked, pouring wine and presenting food while they discuss the voyage. The men's eyes follow you hungrily, but they know you're the captain's property. He enjoys showing you off, making you pose and demonstrate your obedience. "She's learning well," he comments proudly. After the meal, he dismisses his guests and uses you on the dinner table, reminding you who owns you.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale103}Display yourself proudly for your master's guests.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_captains_chained
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale50}The captain keeps you chained in his cabin now, the heavy iron collar around your neck connected to a short chain he holds. You've learned to anticipate his desires - when he wants you close, when he wants you on your knees, when he wants to remind you that you're his property. He leads you around the cabin by the chain, sometimes gently, sometimes roughly, always reinforcing that you belong to him. The crew knows you're off-limits now, marked as the captain's personal possession. He uses you whenever the mood strikes, and you've stopped resisting.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_captains_punishment_leash
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale63}The captain's face darkens at your resistance. "I see you need a reminder of your place," he growls. He attaches a rope leash to your collar and drags you out onto the deck. "On your hands and knees," he orders. Humiliated, you drop down as he parades you around the ship like a dog, the crew laughing and jeering. He makes you crawl the entire length of the deck multiple times while sailors mock you and tug at the leash. "This is what happens when you forget you're my property," the captain says coldly. When he finally brings you back to his cabin, you're exhausted and thoroughly humiliated.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale122}Bark like a dog to amuse the crew.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_captains_punishment_mess
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale65}The captain's expression hardens when you pull away. "You dare hesitate?" he snarls. He drags you by your hair down to the mess hall where the crew is eating. He chains you naked to a post in the center of the room. "She needs to remember what happens to disobedient slaves," he announces. For the next several hours, you're on display as the crew eats, drinks, and leers at you. Some reach out to grope you as they pass. The captain sits at his table, watching coldly. "This is your place when you displease me," he says. "Remember that."

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_captains_devoted
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale53}You kneel between the captain's legs, the single shackle on your wrist a symbol of your willing bondage. You no longer need the heavy chains - you've become curious about your own submission, almost eager to please him. When he tugs the light chain attached to your wrist, you follow immediately, looking up at him with a mixture of submission and anticipation. You've started to crave his touch, his approval. The way he uses you feels natural now, and you find yourself wondering what new ways you can serve him. Your body responds to his presence automatically, and you realize with a strange thrill that you don't want to leave.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_captains_perfect
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale56}You don't need chains anymore. You follow the captain everywhere, staying close to his side without needing to be told. Your mind is completely focused on him - his needs, his desires, his pleasure. You've become the perfect slave, moving when he wants you to move, speaking only when spoken to, offering your body whenever he glances your way. The crew watches in amazement at your complete devotion. You no longer remember wanting anything else. When he takes you, your body responds with practiced perfection, every movement designed to maximize his pleasure. You exist only for him, and that thought fills you with deep contentment.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_captains_punishment_deck
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale67}The captain is furious at your continued resistance. "You need to be broken properly," he declares. He drags you up to the main deck in broad daylight and throws you down onto the wooden planks. "The crew can have you today," he announces. "Show her what happens to slaves who displease me." The sailors cheer and gather around. For hours under the hot sun, they take turns using your body while the captain watches from the ship's wheel. You're left sprawled on the deck, covered in sweat and cum, a public spectacle of what happens to disobedient property.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale126}Spit and curse until they gag you.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_captains_discarded
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale59}The captain has grown tired of you. One morning, he simply announces to the crew that you're no longer his exclusive property. "She's worn out her welcome in my cabin," he says dismissively. "She's all yours now." The crew cheers as you're led out, no longer the captain's prized possession but common property for all to use. You don't protest - you can't even form the thought to protest. Your mind is so thoroughly broken that the change means nothing to you. You exist only to serve, and it doesn't matter who you serve. The crew uses you constantly, passing you between them, and you accept everything with the same vacant, submissive expression. You are completely brain dead to anything except obedience.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale128}Stare blankly as they pass you around.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_storm
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale16}A violent storm hits the ship. You're left chained below deck as water pours in and the vessel pitches wildly. The crew is too busy fighting for survival to worry about you. In the darkness and chaos, you genuinely fear you'll drown, forgotten and shackled. When the storm finally passes, a sailor comes down to check the cargo. Finding you alive, he grins and says you owe him a reward for not leaving you to drown. He unfastens his breeches before you can respond.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale18}Stay still and let him take what he wants.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_port_brothel
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale19}The ship docks at a bustling port city. Instead of staying aboard, you're taken to a waterfront brothel owned by the captain's associate. You realize you're being loaned out to pay for supplies and repairs. For the next several days, you service sailors, merchants, and dockworkers - anyone with coin. The brothel keeper tracks each customer with marks on your thigh. By the time the captain returns to collect you, you've lost count of how many men have used your body.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_broken
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale22}You no longer remember what port you sailed from or where you're going. The days blur together in an endless cycle of serving the crew's needs. You've learned to anticipate when they'll want you, learned which positions they prefer, learned to swallow without gagging. When the ship's bell rings for the changing of the watch, your body responds automatically - legs spreading, mouth opening. You are the ship's whore, and you can barely remember being anything else.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_broken_escape_chance
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale25}A moment of clarity pierces through the fog of submission. You were someone once - a warrior, a leader. Not just a set of holes for sailors to use. The ship is docking at a port, and for the first time in what feels like forever, you see an opportunity. But the alternative... staying here where everything is decided for you, where your only purpose is to pleasure men... there's a dark comfort in that simplicity.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_sold_at_port
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale29}The captain announces he's found a buyer at port - a wealthy merchant looking for exotic entertainment. You're paraded in front of the merchant wearing nothing but your chains, displayed like livestock. The merchant examines you thoroughly, testing your obedience by ordering you to perform various degrading acts while the captain watches and names his price. After some haggling, coin changes hands and your ownership transfers. The merchant's guards lead you away to his ship, bound for a foreign land.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale132}Kneel and kiss his boots to show your obedience.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_sold_to_tradeship
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale69}A slave trader's ship has arrived at port, and your captor sees an opportunity. You're dragged before the ship's slaver, a weathered man with cold, calculating eyes. He examines you like livestock, checking your teeth, squeezing your muscles, and running his hands over your body in a clinical assessment of your worth. After brief haggling, coin changes hands and you're shackled with the rest of the slaves. The trader grins as he chains you to the mast. "You'll fetch a good price at the next port," he says. "But first, my crew needs entertainment for the voyage."

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale135}Beg the slaver to be gentle with you.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_sold_to_tradeship_slave
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale71}A slave trader's ship has docked, and your owner decides to sell you. You're brought before the ship's slaver along with other merchandise. He examines you thoroughly, noting your obedience level and physical condition. "This one's already broken in," he observes with satisfaction. After the transaction, you're transferred to the trader's custody, chained with the other slaves destined for distant markets. The slaver pats your head mockingly. "Don't worry, we'll keep you busy during the voyage."

CEEvent.Name: CE_tavern_kidnap_attempt
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale31}You're drinking alone at a tavern when you notice several rough-looking men watching you intently. Before you can react, they surround your table. Their leader, a scarred man with missing teeth, grins menacingly. "You'll fetch a fine price at the slave markets," he growls. The other patrons look away nervously as the slavers close in. You need to act fast.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale35}Try your luck and make a run for it.

CEEvent.Name: CE_tavern_kidnap_fight_win
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale36}You draw your weapon and fight with desperate fury. The tavern erupts into chaos as you clash with the slavers. Tables shatter, drinks spill, and patrons scramble for safety. Your combat skills prove superior - you down two of them quickly, and the others realize they've underestimated you. The leader curses and signals a retreat. "This one's not worth the trouble!" he snarls, dragging his wounded companions out. The tavern keeper thanks you nervously and offers you a free drink.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale139}Report the slavers to the city guard.

CEEvent.Name: CE_tavern_kidnap_charm_success
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale38}You smile seductively at the leader, your voice smooth as honey. "Gentlemen, surely we can come to a better arrangement? I'm worth far more as an ally than as merchandise." You lean in close, letting your hand trail along his arm. Your charm works - the slaver's eyes glaze over with lust. "Maybe you're right," he murmurs. You continue weaving your spell, buying time. When you suggest discussing business in his private quarters, he readily agrees. Once you have him alone and distracted, you knock him unconscious with a bottle and slip away into the night.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale141}Tie him up and take everything of value.

CEEvent.Name: CE_tavern_kidnap_escape_success
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale40}Your street smarts kick in immediately. You knock over your chair as a distraction, then melt into the crowd of tavern patrons. Using the chaos, you slip between bodies, duck under tables, and navigate through the kitchen. The cook yells at you, but you're already out the back door. You hear the slavers shouting behind you, but you know these alleys. Within minutes, you've lost them in the maze of back streets. Your heart pounds, but you're safe.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale142}Find the city guard and report the slavers.
{=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale143}Lay low at a different inn until morning.

CEEvent.Name: CE_tavern_kidnap_luck_success
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale42}You bolt for the door with pure desperation. The slavers lunge for you, but fortune favors you - one trips over a chair, another collides with a serving wench carrying a tray of drinks. You burst out into the street just as a nobleman's carriage passes by. You leap onto the back without thinking, clinging on as it speeds away. By the time the slavers reach the street, you're already out of sight. You drop off a few blocks away, your heart racing but your freedom intact.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale144}Double back to make sure you weren't followed.
{=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale145}Find a tavern and celebrate your narrow escape.

CEEvent.Name: CE_tavern_kidnap_luck_fail
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale44}You make a desperate dash for the exit, but luck isn't on your side. A slaver's hand catches your hair, yanking you back brutally. You crash into a table, dazed. Before you can recover, rough hands pin you down. "Nice try, bitch," the leader snarls. They drag you struggling through the tavern as other patrons look away. Outside, they throw a sack over your head and bind your wrists. You feel yourself being thrown into a wagon. The last thing you hear before losing consciousness is the leader saying, "She'll learn obedience on the ship."

CEEvent.Name: CE_tavern_kidnap_captured
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale46}Despite your best efforts, the slavers overwhelm you. There are too many of them, and they're experienced fighters. A club strikes the back of your head, and the world spins. As you collapse, you feel hands tearing at your clothes and weapons. "Got her!" someone shouts triumphantly. Through fading consciousness, you feel yourself being bound and gagged. The leader's scarred face looms over you. "You'll fetch an even higher price after we break that spirit." Everything goes black as they haul you away.

CEEvent.Name: CE_tavern_kidnap_surrender
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale48}You lower your weapon, realizing you're outmatched. "I surrender," you say quietly. The slavers grin victoriously. "Smart girl," the leader says, stepping forward. "Now strip. Let's see what we've bought." Your hands shake as you obey, removing your armor and clothes piece by piece while they watch hungrily. Once you're naked, they collar you with heavy iron. "Much better," the leader purrs, running his hands over your body. "You'll make us rich. And maybe we'll have some fun with you on the voyage." They lead you out of the tavern by a chain, completely naked and utterly defeated.

CEEvent.Name: CE_captivity_sexual_escape_success_naval
CEEvent.Text: {=CE_captivity_sexual_escape_success_naval_text}You time your escape perfectly as the ship docks. Slipping between crates of cargo and distracted sailors, you make it to the gangplank. Your heart pounds as you blend into the crowd of dockworkers and merchants on the wharf. You don't allow yourself to look back until you're several streets away from the harbor. When you finally stop in a shadowed alley, gasping for breath, the reality hits you - you're free. The weight of chains, both physical and mental, begins to lift. The road to recovery will be long, but at least you have a chance now.

CEEvent.Name: CE_captivity_sexual_escape_success_naval_swim
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale74}Under cover of darkness, you slip over the side of the ship. The water is frigid and the waves violent, but you manage to find debris from the storm - broken planks and barrels lashed together into a makeshift raft. You haul yourself onto it, gasping and shivering. The ship continues on its course, its crew unaware of your escape. You're adrift now, naked and exposed to the elements, but you're free. The raft bobs on the waves as you drift away from your captors. Whatever fate awaits you on these waters, it's better than the chains you left behind.

CEEvent.Name: CE_captivity_sexual_escape_success_naval_boat
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale77}During a supply stop, you manage to reach one of the small rowing boats tethered to the ship. Your hands shake as you cut the rope and push off, praying no one notices. You row frantically toward the shore, your muscles screaming. Shouts erupt behind you - they've discovered your escape. But you're already too far away.

CEEvent.Name: CE_captivity_sexual_escape_success_naval_cargo
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale79}When the ship docks to unload cargo, you hide yourself inside an empty barrel being moved to the warehouse. You barely breathe as longshoremen roll your hiding place down the gangplank and into a storage building. Hours pass before you dare emerge, cramped and sore but on solid ground. You slip out through a window and into the city streets. By the time your captors realize you're missing, you're already lost in the urban crowds, just another face in a sea of people.

CEEvent.Name: CE_captivity_sexual_escape_failure_naval
CEEvent.Text: {=CE_captivity_sexual_escape_failure_naval_text}You're spotted almost immediately. A sailor shouts "The slave is escaping!" and suddenly hands are grabbing you from all directions. You're thrown to the deck as the crew closes in, their faces twisted with anger. The captain arrives, his expression cold and furious. "I see you need to be reminded of your place," he says quietly, which is somehow more terrifying than if he'd shouted. What follows is brutal and public - they strip you naked on the deck and take turns using your body while the others watch and jeer. By the time they're done, you're left sprawled on the wooden planks, covered in their seed, every part of you aching. The message is clear: escape is not an option.

CEEvent.Name: CE_captivity_sexual_escape_failure_naval_drowned
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale83}You jump overboard in a desperate bid for freedom, but the water is rougher than it looked. The waves batter you mercilessly, dragging you under again and again. Your strength fades quickly, and just as you're about to go under for the last time, a boat hook snags your hair. Sailors haul you back aboard like a caught fish, coughing up seawater. The captain stands over you, shaking his head. "Stupid girl. The sea would have killed you." He orders you chained spread-eagle on the deck as punishment. For the next several hours, every crew member who wants you can take you, and there's nothing you can do but endure.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale155}Kick and scream until they knock you out.

CEEvent.Name: CE_captivity_sexual_escape_failure_naval_port
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale85}You make it to the gangplank, your heart racing with hope. But a guard stationed at the dock spots you immediately. "Runaway slave!" he bellows. Before you can react, he and several dockworkers tackle you to the ground. Your captors arrive moments later, fury in their eyes. As punishment for your escape attempt, they strip you naked right there on the dock and let the dockworkers have their way with you as a crowd gathers to watch. You're used publicly, your screams echoing across the waterfront, a warning to any other slave who might think of running.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale156}Plead with the watching crowd for help.

CEEvent.Name: CE_captivity_sexual_escape_failure_naval_hidden
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale87}You wedge yourself into a tiny space in the cargo hold, praying they won't find you. For hours you hear them searching, calling your name with increasing anger. Your muscles cramp and your breathing grows shallow. Finally, a sailor peers into your hiding spot with a lantern. "Found the bitch!" he shouts gleefully. They drag you out, your limbs stiff from being cramped. The captain decides your punishment should match your crime - you're locked in a tiny cage in the hold, barely large enough to crouch in, and left there for days. Sailors visit regularly to use you through the bars, treating you like a caged animal.

CEEvent.Name: CE_captivity_sexual_escape_failure_naval_city
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale89}You make it off the ship and into the city streets, hope surging through you. But you don't get far. A bounty hunter recognizes the slave collar around your neck and tackles you in an alley. He drags you back to your captors, demanding his reward. The captain pays him, then turns his cold gaze on you. "You cost me money and time," he says. Your punishment is severe - branded with a hot iron to mark you as a chronic runaway, then passed around the entire crew for a full day and night. When they're finally done with you, you can barely move, your body a canvas of bruises and bite marks.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale160}Cry and scream as the brand touches your skin.

CEEvent.Text: Skill check event

CEEvent.Name: CE_escape_skill_broken_athletics
CEEvent.Text: Skill check event

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_escape_low
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale73}The ship docks at a busy port to take on supplies. Your chains are lighter than usual, and the crew is distracted by the bustle of the harbor. You notice a gap in their watch rotation - a narrow window of opportunity. Your spirit hasn't been broken yet, and you still remember who you were before capture. The urge to flee pulses through your veins. You could try to slip away during the chaos of loading cargo, blend into the crowd of dockworkers and merchants, and disappear into the city. But if you're caught, the punishment will be severe.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale75}Stay put. The risk is too great.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_escape_low_storm
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale90}A sudden storm crashes over the ship. The crew scrambles to secure the rigging and tie down cargo as waves batter the hull. In the chaos, you see opportunity - barrels and debris are breaking free, floating in the churning sea. Your chains have loosened from the violent rocking. You're still strong, your will unbroken. If you can slip over the side during this chaos, you might be able to grab floating debris and fashion a makeshift raft. The storm is dangerous, but staying enslaved is worse.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale91}Jump into the storm and grab debris!

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_escape_low_shipwreck
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale93}The ship strikes something beneath the waves with a sickening crunch. Wood splinters and water pours into the hold. The crew rushes to the pumps, completely forgetting about the slaves. You wrench desperately at your bonds as cold water rises around your ankles. Large pieces of the mast and hull are breaking off, floating nearby. Just when panic threatens to overwhelm you, the chain snaps - rusted through by salt water. You could make it to the floating wreckage and cling to it, escaping while the crew fights to save the ship.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_escape_medium_low
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale76}The ship pulls into port for repairs, and you're temporarily moved to a warehouse near the docks. The guards are fewer here, and you notice the lock on your cage is rusted. You've learned their patterns over the weeks of captivity - you know when they change shifts, when they drink, when they're least vigilant. Part of you has grown accustomed to this life, but a stubborn spark of defiance still flickers. You could try to pick the lock with a piece of metal you've hidden, then slip out during the night watch. But you've seen what they do to recaptured slaves...

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_escape_medlow_storm
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale96}Thunder roars as massive waves crash over the deck. The ship lists dangerously, and sailors cry out in panic. You're chained in the hold, but the violence of the storm has created a gap in the hull near your shackles. Through the opening, you can see broken barrels and splintered planks floating in the churning water. Your mind is cloudier than it once was - weeks of abuse have dulled your spirit. But the storm awakens something primal. You could force your way through the gap and try to reach the floating debris before you drown. It's a desperate gamble.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale98}Stay put and pray the ship holds.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_escape_medlow_night
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale99}The ship rocks gently on a moonless night. Most of the crew is below deck, only a skeleton watch remains. You're chained on deck, awaiting your turn to service the night watch. But the guard has fallen asleep, his snoring loud and regular. The darkness is absolute, perfect cover. The chains are loose enough that you might be able to slip them. There's debris in the water - barrels that fell overboard earlier. You could slip over the rail silently and reach them before anyone notices. But the water is cold and dark, and the thought of drowning terrifies you.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_escape_medium_high
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale79}A violent storm hits the ship, and in the chaos of securing cargo and manning the sails, you find yourself momentarily unguarded. The ship has pulled close to a rocky coastline for shelter. You could try to jump overboard and swim for shore - it's not far, but the waters are treacherous. Your mind feels foggy after months of servitude. You've learned to obey, to submit, to accept. But somewhere deep inside, a fading voice whispers that you were someone else once. Someone free. The cold spray of seawater stings your face, and for a moment, clarity pierces through the haze. This might be your last chance.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_escape_high
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale82}The captain has left you alone in his cabin while he attends to ship business. The door is unlocked. Escape would be simple - just walk out, slip into a rowboat, and flee when the ship docks at the next port. But the thought feels alien, wrong somehow. You exist to serve your master. His pleasure is your purpose. Your body moves toward the door hesitantly, but every step feels like wading through deep water. Why would you want to leave? He takes care of you, uses you, owns you. Isn't that enough? A tiny, desperate part of your fractured mind screams that this isn't right, that you need to run, but it's so faint now, so easy to ignore...

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale83}Fight through the fog. Walk out that door.
{=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale84}Return to your place by the bed. Master will return soon.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_naval_escape_broken
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale85}The ship has docked. The crew has all gone ashore. You're alone, unchained, in an empty vessel. The gangplank is down. Freedom is twenty steps away. But you don't move. You can't remember why you would. Your mind circles the same thoughts: wait for master, serve the crew, obey, submit, please them. The concept of "escape" barely registers as a word anymore. You notice the open gangplank the way you'd notice the color of the sky - a fact without meaning. You should clean the cabin. Master likes it clean. But some deeply buried instinct, some last ember of your former self, makes your body twitch toward the exit. It feels like moving through quicksand. Every muscle resists. You weren't meant to leave. Were you?

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale86}Force yourself to walk. One step. Then another.
{=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale87}This is where you belong. Wait for them to return.

CEEvent.Name: CE_slavery_birth_alt_ship
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale88}In the swaying depths of the slave ship, your time has come. Chained among other unfortunate souls, you endure the agony of childbirth as the vessel cuts through dark waters. An older slave woman helps you through the ordeal, whispering encouragement. When your baby is born, the ship's quartermaster soon discovers your situation. They explain coldly that infants are a liability at sea - your child will be given to someone at the next port, or sold separately. But if you can keep the baby quiet and concealed in the cargo hold, perhaps they might be willing to look the other way.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale89}Accept their terms. Your baby deserves better than a slave ship.
{=DefaultSlaveryEventsNavalFemale90}Hide your baby among the cargo. You will not be parted from your child.
